<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Verify a Vyper contract with its source code and contract creation information

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"module","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["contract"]},"required":true},{"name":"action","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["verify_vyper_contract"]},"required":true},{"name":"apiKey","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"pk_1234567890","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"addressHash":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"compilerVersion":{"type":"string"},"contractSourceCode":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
